title: Student Literacy Activity Implementation and Evaluation: ADDIE Model-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental reading/writing abilities and social interaction experience
context.additional_context: Activity-centered education to improve social literacy in bring-your-own-device (BYOD) settings

learning_goals: Learners can form a daily 20+ minute reading habit within three months, improving critical reading skills by over 70%.
Learners achieve a score of 4 or higher on evaluation criteria for logical structuring abilities through creative writing activities.
Learners systematically document their literacy improvement process through peer/self-assessment at least three times.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
